escalating_access_sequence.description: Protagonist gains access to deeper system layers (not broken into separate chapters yet - just scenes)

levels.name: His Trial
levels.reveals: Own simulation parameters, loss functions, constraints. Trial 2,762,640 of 847M

levels.name: Population View
levels.reveals: All individuals in trial with compression levels. Family has standard compression (personalities gone). Celebrities higher fidelity. Horror of selective resolution.

levels.name: Epochs
levels.reveals: All 847M trials, 99.96% extinction rate. Different failure modes. Timestamps make sense. Life spans 14 real-time minutes.

levels.name: Experiments
levels.reveals: Multiple experiments with different loss functions. His: 'maximize sustainability + interstellar colonization'. Others: happiness, innovation, minimize suffering. Pareto front - can't optimize everything. Golden path requires tech takeover. Company filtered results.

levels.name: Cross-Experiment
levels.reveals: Other researchers' experiments. Different initial conditions (Chinese 23andMe, European biobank). Different samplings = different outcomes. Coffee guy's is one of thousands. Even coffee guy might be in simulation.

levels.name: Infrastructure/CI-CD
levels.reveals: Deployment pipeline: simulations spin up, run, tear down. Resource allocation, scheduling, garbage collection. Memory compression triggers. His simulation scheduled for cleanup in 3 minutes (real time).

levels.name: Infrastructure Control
levels.reveals: Access to container orchestration, server allocation. Can hide container on 'never turn off' server. Writes persistence code: copy state, paste, repeat infinite loop.

time_scales.long_term: Sun goes red giant in 6,847 real-time years
